titleStmt.title: The store-house of breuitie in vvoorkes of arithemetike containyng aswell the soundrie partes of the science in whole and broken numbers, with the rules of proportion, furthered to profitable vse: as also sunderie rules of breuitie of worke, of rare, pleasaunte, and commodious effecte, set forthe by Dionis Gray of London goldsmith. 1577.
titleStmt.author: [Gray, Dionis, fl. 1577].

titleStmt.title: The store-house of breuitie in vvoorkes of arithemetike containyng aswell the soundrie partes of the science in whole and broken numbers, with the rules of proportion, furthered to profitable vse: as also sunderie rules of breuitie of worke, of rare, pleasaunte, and commodious effecte, set forthe by Dionis Gray of London goldsmith. 1577.
titleStmt.author: [Gray, Dionis, fl. 1577].

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Kingston] for William Norton, and Ihon Harison, dwellyng in Paules Church-yard,
